name: Run io
description:
Can you beat other player cells and get high scores?!
You must just run in this addictive game!
Your cell run from the cell predator! Test your reflexes!
Slide to avoid obstacles, collect food and be the most largest cell in this game world !!!

FEATURES:
+ Amazing simple gameplay - play everywhere!!!

+ Cool graphics!

+ Test your reaction!

+ Collect food and grow up!
